pkgmetadata.longdescription: A collection of packages for gap matching the content of the gap_packages spkg for sage. Packages included are: Alnuth-3.0.0, HAPcryst, Hap1.10, autpgrp, braid-1.2, crime, ctbllib, design, factint, grape, guava-3.12, laguna, polycyclic-2.11, polymaking, sonata and toric1.8.
